item.title: Bookmark
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description:
A novelty gift for the avid reader!

Cut from 100% Alder wood, these eco-friendly bookmarks are etched with a deep textural design and packed in a custom-cut, faux leather packaging. Ready for gifting!

Approx. 8" x 2"

item.title: Hooray Cake Topper
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description:
Scripted by hand and crafted from laser cut wood, our most versatile cake topper is ready to celebrate any joyous occasion

-6.25" x 7.75"

item.title: Basketball Hoop
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description:
This reclaimed style basketball goal measures 25"x20" and comes with a 9" black hoop and white net.

Perfect for any bedroom or office!

There is light assembly required. Holes have been predrilled for the hoop, you just have to attach it with the included screws.

item.title: Barbecue Toy Set
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description: Grill it, slice it, and turn it! Cook up a fantastic feast with this deluxe wooden barbecue playset! The 24-piece set includes specialty grilling favorites like a whole rotisserie chicken that spins on a skewer, a whole fish, sausage, shrimp, and even vegetables for grilling kabobs. Use the kid-friendly wooden basting brush, spatula, tongs, and knife to prepare, flip, grab, and cut the food. This grill is easy to “fire up” with its ignition switch; adjust the temperature with the movable knobs on the barbecue, and turn the rotisserie so the food grills to perfection! The chicken, fish, and sausage pieces are held together with self-stick tabs; use the knife to slice them apart. After mealtime, use the grill as a handy storage place for all the items! The Wooden Rotisserie & Grill Barbecue Set encourages hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, creative expression, and imaginative play.

item.title: Bow Tie
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description: Bernard is what all the cool kids are wearing. It’s trendy cotton centerpiece along with the striking grain and color of the Shedua wood will add that extra dose of dandy to your outfit. We promise this wooden bowtie won’t let you down.

item.title: Coasters
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description:
4 decorative natural wood coasters, made from reclaimed willow wood. Wood is a natural product and varies in appearance. These would be great at place settings or for decoration around the house. These coasters come tied with twine and are ready for gifting.

Each coaster measures approximately 3 - 4 inches in diameter and are about a ¼ of an inch thick.

item.title: Tree Pennant
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description:
Deep brown wood pennant.

Measures approx 22" long x 9.5" and is ¼" birch

item.title: Slab Pedastal
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description: Wood Slab Pedestal to elevate your candles or potted plants and add dimension to your space. Each pedestal has a unique wood grain and raw edge.

item.title: Succulent Planter
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description:
These finely crafted succulent planters will look great on your desk or anywhere your office could use a touch of color.

The holes bored in these planters are just the right size for easy transplant from a 4" pot with a bit of extra mix and gravel. Plants are not included however they are commonly available at Home Depot, home centers and florists.

item.title: Candle Holders
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description:
These candle holders will add charm to any room. 3 tea light candle holders, they are 2" 4" and 6" high and about 3-4 in diameter. Handmade from reclaimed wood in my wood shop. They would make great wedding centerpieces, housewarming gifts, Mothers Day, nineth-anniversary gifts or just to pretty up your tabletop or shelf. Larger quantities are available, please email for availability and pricing.

Tea lights are included.

item.title: Wooden Walking Goose
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description:
Cut & crafted in the Fox River Valley, assembled, painted and polished in the Chippewa Valley, this wooden goose toy is the product of a father-daughter team. We know this little wooden goose toy will waddle into you & your children’s hearts, enjoy!

When your child pushes a Chippewaddler, the sturdy oak handle and stick propel the wooden toy forward. Practice motor skills and balance with this BPA free, children’s toy. Every wooden walking goose toy is unique because of the grain texture.

WARNING: Family pet may not welcome harmless Chippewaddler with open paws. Hilarity may ensue while dear ole' Spot is chased by flapping, quacking, wooden goose.

item.title: Wood Banner
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description:
Be kind banner in black with wood lettering.

Approx 10" wide x 12" tall at longest point

item.title: Leather Handle Wooden Tray
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description: Leather Handle Wood Tray is a generously sized serving platter used to display everything from candles, small vases, or hors-d'oeuvres for a dinner party. Its leather handles make this product easy to carry and move around as you see fit, adding color and texture to any space.

item.title: Ladder
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description:
Display your blankets and quilts on this beautiful white and dark stained blanket ladder! Perfect touch of earthy wood and modern white. No need to keep the blankets in the closet. Ladder adds a special touch to your living room or bedroom. Another great idea is in the bathroom to hang towels from! My ladders are made from the finest materials, making them very sturdy to last for many years.

Measures: 6 foot tall (72") with 5 rungs and each rung is 15" long and 2.5" tall. Total width 18".

item.title: Whisk
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description:
To achieve the most comfortable hold, the wood is tumbled for an ultra-smooth finish, and the handles are tapered for a natural grip. This sturdy stainless-steel whisk features a darkly hued, subtly grained walnut handle that will age beautifully over time.

The handle is shaped like an artist’s paintbrush for a comfortable grip with solid walnut construction with stainless-steel tines.

item.title: Nesting Houses
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description: Bring a touch of the outdoors into your home with these Wood Nesting Houses from Hearth & Hand. This set of three simply designed wooden houses feature different shapes with window cutouts paired with a natural finish that’s both dynamic and versatile in style.

item.title: Mug
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description: Carved wood mugs are perfect for your morning cup of Joe or your afternoon pick-me-up! With its unique wood grain, no 2 mugs look exactly alike.

item.title: Deer Teether
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description:
This chunky wood deer is nicely weighted and easily grasped, while the finely sanded wood makes them perfect for providing gentle counter pressure to sore gums. The beautiful embellishments are wood burned by hand offering a safe alternative to paints and dyes.

Hardwood teethers are cut from maple and sanded smooth- once by machine and again by hand. Once sanded, each piece is polished with organic coconut oil.

item.title: Bookends
item.author: Giltsoff
item.description:
Style meets functionality in this adorable set of stained and painted mountain inspired wooden bookends! These are solid wood and stained with white “snow-capped” painted tops.

Each half measures approximately 7"x4.25"

item.title: Classic Coffeemaker
item.author: Skylar Challand
item.description: Known as a pristine coffeemaker, Chemex employs all of the chemically correct methods for brewing. Its hourglass shaped flask is made entirely of glass, a chemically inert material that does not absorb odors or chemical residues. Includes a polished rubberwood collar with leather tie.
